channel.title: [525] Client Help No One Else Can Connect [525]
channel.description: Hello, Im using the madness 525 client and it has different things in it that makes people see an adament longsword as a chaotic long. I will upload the link to here for it because ive edited client.java to my no-ip and still nothing. Yes i have no-ip and yes i have the downloaded client. Although im not sure what it does. Can someone please help me i have portforwarded and everything, people can conncect on an ip changer but not this for some reason, here is the link now. If you do figure out how. Please let me know (due to advertising i cannot realease the name of my no-ip it will be in the client.java u can edit that in whatever im missing I guess?) I am so sorry if im just missing something so wtf. Thank YOU SOOOOO MUCH IF YOU CAN FIX THIS. Please help here is the dl link for client please fix it and upload :) ill love you forever. LINK: http://www.mediafire.com/?o9swy6tb3xn97x9 thank you guys so much!

Hey guys ive think I figured it out. I went into my file searches and searched for no-ip and other peopleâ€™s came up i change that, then i searched for 127.0.0.1 and 1 came up. It was the static ip. I think its going to work wiaing for co-owner to come now and test :S wish me luck

item.title: [525] Client Help No One Else Can Connect [525]
item.dc:creator: @Cancel Cancel
item.description:
@Cancel wrote:

i think i had this problem, it had something to do with my firewall. to test this, try turning it off simply and trying. if it works then turn it back on and try adding certain programs to the acception list in your firewall till you find the right thing.

Read full topic
